colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(ZHES MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR 'DI NI RGYUD LAS GSUNGS PA 'DIR LHAN THABS BSNAN NAS BRIS PA NI, DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA'I THA SHAL BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS RANG DANG SKAL MNYAM RNAMS SU PHAN PAR RE BA BSAMS PA'I SGO NAS GYIS LA, NYES LTUNG LHAG CHAD BYUNG BA BLA MA MGON PO 'KHOR BCAS KYI SPYAN SNGAR BSHAGS SHING BZOD PAR ZHUS, GAL TE LEGS CHA CUNG YOD NA DI YIS BDAG SOGS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD BYANG CHUB SNYING MA THOB KYI BAR DU BLA MA MGON PO 'KHOR BCAS KYIS 'BREL MED 'GROGS MDZOD NAS 'GAL RKYEN BAR CHAD KUN SEL ZHING MCHOG DANG THUN MONG GI DNGOS GRUB GROGS MDZAD PAR GYUR CIG ,DGE'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
